name: taxon-concept-relation
title: Taxon Concept Relation
description: A directed taxon relation representing RCC5 taxon concept assertions.

fields.name: taxonID
fields.description: The subject taxon this relation originates from.

fields.name: relatedTaxonID
fields.description: The object this taxon relates to.

fields.name: sourceID
fields.description: Optional identifier for the source this record came from as listed in the [metadata.yaml](https://github.com/CatalogueOfLife/coldp/blob/master/metadata.yaml)

fields.name: type
fields.description: The kind of directed RCC5 relation that specifies how the two taxon concepts are related.

fields.name: referenceID
fields.description: A reference where this relation was documented or who asserted it.
